document_data.name: Urgan Dyrr
document_data.mainbody: '''Urgan Dyrr''' was a member of [[House Agrach Dyrr]] of [[Menzoberranzan]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.History: Urgan was the scarred weapon master of House Agrach Dyrr during the siege of his compound during the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]].
